resources.string: Welcome to the Stool PArasite DEtector \n(SPADE)
Powered by San Pablo CEU University
This App allows the user to submit images taken with a microscope, in order to detect the presence of enteric parasites in human stool samples. This App is intended to help in coprological analysis.

This App makes use of a machine learning algorithm to automatically detect parasites in stool samples. 

The App requires a .jpg image taken at 40x, which is sent to the algorithm in order to be meticulously analysed and processed. If everything goes according to plan, you will see the same picture displayed, but with annotations surrounding the microorganisms which were found by the algorithm. 

After that, the annotated image will be saved to a database for research purposes, and you can also save it to your Camera Roll!
This App, with the use of machine learning technology, can detect many different species of parasites that are occasionally present in human stool.

string.name: CDCWebsite
string.a: To see detailed information about these fascinating little organisms, go check them out at: \nhttps://www.cdc.gov/dpdx/az.html

resources.string: Your image is being processed, please wait…
